author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police special teams have arrested Maharajan (30) of Thoothukudi on Monday for his alleged involvement in the abduction of the family members of a gold trader here two weeks ago. The police said that Maharajan was wanted in a murder case in Thoothukudi. He was said to be an associate of Antony arrested earlier.

The police were on the look out for two more persons.

Burglary

Two houses were burgled in the city on Monday. S. Sulthana (55) of Bank of India Colony, Kovaipudur, lost about 50 gm of gold jewellery, and Rs. 10,000.

K. Navaneetham (55) of Duraisamy Layout in Avarampalayam lost about 25 gm of gold jewellery.
title: Abduction: one more arrested
